definition: to walk (side part of split character)
to talk about/to narrate/to give an account
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account

sentences.english: Wayne B. Wheeler, General Counsel of the Anti-Saloon League of America, September, 1925.
sentences.chinese: 美國反聚會聯盟組織的總議員，1925述。

sentences.english: We describe some different techniques, roughly in descending order of performance.
sentences.chinese: 我們大概按照性能降低的順序來講述一些不同的技術。

sentences.english: A page description language developed by, Adobe Systems Inc. of America.
sentences.chinese: 由美國阿都比系統公司開發的頁述語言。

sentences.english: The name of the third is Tigris; this is the river which runs east of Asshur.
sentences.chinese: 第三股名希底結河，亦即流經述之東那條河。

sentences.english: The details and recommendations for each option are presented in this order.
sentences.chinese: 本文將以此爲序來講述每個選項的詳細信息和建議。

sentences.english: Another interesting techniques is to use vertical scrolling to tell a story.
sentences.chinese: 另外一個有趣的技巧是利用垂直滾動來講述一個故事。

sentences.english: Its pure, unvarnished truth is told with down-home common sense.
sentences.chinese: 書中單純質樸的事實是用地道的常識來講述的。

sentences.english: In this thesis I present what I believe to be a new approach to the problem of predication .
sentences.chinese: 在本論文中，我提出對錶述問題的一條新進路。

sentences.english: Debater number 1of negative side, are you ready? Time begins.
sentences.chinese: 反方辯手1號稱述觀點，你準備好了嗎？開始時間。

sentences.english: The second part is to seize the cultural characteristics of the novel's bulk.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要是抓住小說中的散文化特徵來講述的。

sentences.english: Ms. Lung wanted to tell this history through the tales or ordinary people.
sentences.chinese: 龍女士希望通過普通人來講述這段歷史。

sentences.english: The principle of the second law of thermodynamics tells us that an increase in entropy implies a loss of information.
sentences.chinese: 熱力學第二定律述的熵的增加代表信息的喪失。
